name: CLASH
description: Clash is a hard-core action/rpg arena blend. With a wide variety of skills to mix and match that inspires creativity and unique styles, Clash lives up to its goal as an action game for the brainy. Play multiplayer with friends or compete in the single-player league by making your way up the leader-board.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIndows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: AMD FX-6100 | Intel Core i5-2400. Or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7770 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560. Or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I cant really say much about the game because A: I got it from a steam key that I got for free and B: I wasn`t able to play a game because in every region the servers were empty. I would be happy if I could test this to see if it is worth the 6 Euro when you buy it normaly but it looks like noone plays this game. xD
